author: jvanzyl
msg: o Get rid of lots of excess baggage.

author: bwalding
msg: o MAVEN-283: Use absolute paths for src / dest dir. Required for basedir's with .. in them

author: bwalding
msg: o Due to the variations between projects, some projects are passing in full paths
and others are relative paths.  This change checks to see if the path has
already been appended to ${basedir}. If not, it prepends basedir.  JXRBean
now expects something that will slot directly into new File(path).

author: bwalding
msg: o MAVEN-289: Apply patch from Eric Weidner to handle local repositories

author: kaz
msg: Adding velocity to the list of deps.
